Chasing the Flame: A Conversation with Samantha Power -- Thursday, March 13, at 6 p.m. Rabb Lecture Hall (ext. 2212), The journalist, writer, and professor will speak about her book, Chasing the Flame: Sergio Vieira de Mello and the Fight to Save the World. She is currently affiliated with the Carr Center for Human Rights Policy at Harvard University's Kennedy School of Government. De Mello is the UN High Commissioner for Human Rights and United Nations Special Representative in Iraq who was killed in the Canal Hotel bombing in Baghdad. This lecture is one of several sponsored at the Boston Public Library by the Lowell Institute, presented in partnership with Facing History and Ourselves's Choosing to Participate multimedia exhibition.
